topic.title: Navigation
topic.shortdesc: This library contains text used to describe commonly used UI controls. For now it contains only navigation controls, but we could add other types later.

section.title: List navigation
section.p:
If you want to reuse this information you’ll have to add a definition list
to your topic and conref each that you need. The content in the next

is a nice introductory sentence that you can add manually.
For all types of lists the following navigation controls are enabled if there are too many list items for all to be displayed:

dlentry.dd: Shows the first items in the list.
Shows the previous items in the list.
Indicates the number and relative position of items currently visible — for example, “51-75 of 2086”.
Shows the next items in the list.
Shows the last items in the list.

section.title: Collapsible panels
section.p:
If you want to reuse this information you’ll have to add a definition list
to your topic and conref each that you need. The content in the next

is a nice introductory sentence that you can add manually.
